guid.description: Unique identifier for the mod that added this. Blank if it's added as part of the base game.

icon.description:
Name of the file containing the icon for this object. Example: MyCustomGood.png
Icon size: 128x128 pixels

displayName.description:
Name that will appear in the game.
Defaults to english. To include more languages, add a new field with the language code to the end of the key. For example, 'displayName' => 'displayName_pl' for polish.

description.description:
Long Description describing what it does.
Defaults to english. To include more languages, add a new field with the language code to the end of the key. For example, 'displayName' => 'displayName_pl' for polish.

shortName.description:
Shorter version of the Name.
Defaults to english. To include more languages, add a new field with the language code to the end of the key. For example, 'displayName' => 'displayName_pl' for polish.

index.description: Position in the list of difficulties. Starts at 0 for the first difficulty.

ascensionIndex.description: Position in the list of ascension difficulties. 0 if not prestige difficulty or first prestige in the list.

sealFragmentsForWin.description: Amount of seal fragments earned when winning the game with this difficulty selected.

isAscension.description: When set to true will set this difficulty to be a prestige difficulty.

canBePicked.description: When set to false will hide this difficulty from the list of difficulties.

isInCustomGame.description: When set to false will hide this difficulty from the list of difficulties in custom games.

modifiers.description:
List of effects that are applied to this difficulty.

For more information, see:
https://github.com/JamesVeug/AgainstTheStormAPI/blob/master/ATS_API/Scripts/Helpers/Enums/AscensionModifierTypes.cs
https://hoodedhorse.com/wiki/Against_the_Storm/Difficulty

prestigeLevel.description: Prestige level of the difficulty. Overrides everything in the Difficulty to set the prestige level.

copyModifiersFromPreviousDifficulties.description: When set to true will copy the modifiers from the lower level difficulties.

newModifiers.description: List of new modifiers that are created and applied to this difficulty.

shortDescription.description:
Short Description describing what it does. Typically max 1 line.
Defaults to english. To include more languages, add a new field with the language code to the end of the key. For example, 'displayName' => 'displayName_pl' for polish.

effect.description:
Effect that is applied to the difficulty.

For more information, see:
https://github.com/JamesVeug/AgainstTheStormAPI/blob/master/ATS_API/Scripts/Helpers/Enums/EffectTypes.cs
https://hoodedhorse.com/wiki/Against_the_Storm/Perks

isEarlyEffect.description: When set to true will apply the effect to the difficulty.

isShown.description: When set to false will hide the effect from the list of effects in custom games.

inCustomMode.description: When set to false will hide the effect from the list of effects in custom games.
